name: Crustaceans Innovations
description:
In Crustaceans Innovations you are a seagull. Your goal is to eat the crab via any mean necessary. This includes, pressing buttons, smashing crates and getting impaled by spears.

This was made for the Mini Jam 108 game jam, with the theme "Everything Dies In One Hit"

Hope you enjoy playing!

Controls
----------
WASD - Move
Space - Dash
R - Reset
